title: Shalamrood: Mountain of Jinn
description: Inspired by a true An American-Iranian visits her old cabin in the woods which has been inherited to, accompanied by her husband and five friends. After she tells them an Iranian folklore of Hasani, they start having flashbacks of their secretive lives they've hid and the hauntings begin. Will the conflicts of the past and the Satanical sacrifice of the Jinn in the present make them perceive a glimmer of hope for the future or be submerged in betrayal, lust, longing for love and death?
author: Sahar Nika
